tool_description:
Estimate the total cost of owning a vehicle for the next five years based on the license plate number or vehicle identification number. By analyzing millions of records in the vehicle database, the estimator takes into account factors such as depreciation, insurance, fuel costs, maintenance and repairs, and national taxes. The data is updated monthly.
[View documents](https://rapidapi.com/dominonet-lTpEE6zONeS/api/vehicle-ownership-cost/details)
name: Vehicle Ownership Cost
